data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article De Zoysa, H. K. S., Nguyen, Anh D., Wickramasinghe, S. (2016): Annotated checklist of millipedes (Myriapoda: Diplopoda) of Sri Lanka. Zootaxa 4061 (5): 451-482, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4061.5.1
